known_issues: Blank screen occurs when trying to edit any field on the Field Details page (across multiple fields); user requests inspection of current live deployment and fix.

existing_features.title: Fix the blank-screen crash that occurs when the user opens the Edit Field flow from the Field Details page by making the EditFieldDialog icon picker resilient to missing/invalid Lucide icon component names (e.g., skip unknown icons or render a safe fallback icon instead of throwing during render).

Add a React-level error boundary for the Field Details page area so that if a runtime error still occurs while rendering FieldDetailView and its dialogs, the app shows a user-friendly in-app error state (with a retry/back action) instead of a blank screen.

projectName: Fix blank screen when editing a Field on the Field Details page
